name: Teen Adventure Game - Escape the Room Mission
name_original: Teen Adventure Game - Escape the Room Mission
description:
Teen Adventure Game - Escape the Room Mission is a FREE retro action platformer adventure game!
Guide the brave teen titan hero, go and unlock all doors to find out the legend of secret skyland base.
Is Robin the best? You'll find it out in this hard and dangerous adventure. Be ready to run and jump over titan spikes, iron saws and alien monsters.
Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!
Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!
Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks!
Help Teen to jump up and down with just an easy touch.
Get bonus points by collecting coins. Get ranked in leaderboard.

Teen Adventure Game - Escape the Room Mission is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
